title: Bloomberg Markets: May 24
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: May 24
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Anand Srinivasan Senior Analyst:Semiconductors & Tech Hardware Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing HP Inc. showing accelerating sales momentum in the second quarter, delivering growth in both personal computers and printers for the first time in more than a half-decade.
